data.author: Wayne Dyer
data.quote: If you believe it will work out, you’ll see opportunities. If you believe it won’t, you will see obstacles.

data.author: Thomas Carlyle
data.quote: Permanence, perseverance and persistence in spite of all obstacles, discouragements, and impossibilities: It is this, that in all things distinguishes the strong soul from the weak.

data.author: Zig Ziglar
data.quote: Success means doing the best we can with what we have. Success is the doing, not the getting; in the trying, not the triumph. Success is a personal standard, reaching for the highest that is in us, becoming all that we can be.

data.author: Les Brown
data.quote: If you set goals and go after them with all the determination you can muster, your gifts will take you places that will amaze you.

data.author: Bob Riley
data.quote: Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.

data.author: Theodore Roosevelt
data.quote: Believe you can and you’re halfway there.

data.author: Unknown
data.quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.

data.author: Francis of Assisi
data.quote: Start by doing what’s necessary; then do what’s possible; and suddenly you are doing the impossible.

data.author: Tony Robbins
data.quote: Whatever you hold in your mind on a consistent basis is exactly what you will experience in your life.

data.author: Dale Carnegie
data.quote: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.

data.author: Mahatma Gandhi
data.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.

data.author: Stephen Covey
data.quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.

data.author: Roy T. Bennett
data.quote: Don’t be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.

data.author: that’s life. But I say, ‘Nothing happens to you, it happens for you.’ See the positive in negative events
data.quote: You’re going to go through tough times.

data.author: Jack Canfield
data.quote: If you can tune into your purpose and really align with it, setting goals so that your vision is an expression of that purpose, then life flows much more easily.

data.author: Napoleon Hill
data.quote: Whatever the mind can conceive and believe, it can achieve.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Don’t wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

data.author: Jillian Michaels
data.quote: It’s not about perfect. It’s about effort. And when you bring that effort every single day, that’s where transformation happens. That’s how change occurs.

data.author: Rikki Rogers
data.quote: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.

data.author: Barbara De Angelis
data.quote: We don’t develop courage by being happy every day. We develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
